articles.author: Maxine Koh
articles.title: Snake Eyes star Henry Golding says he drew from past job as travel host to create character - CNA
articles.description: The 34-year-old actor used to host shows on BBC World News, Discovery Channel Asia and CNA. He also shared that he thinks coming into acting later in his career was “such a gift”.
